resources.string: A sign in attempt requires further verification because we did not recognize your device. To complete the sign in, enter the verification code on the unrecognized device.
If you did not attempt to sign in to your account, your password may be compromised. Create a new, strong password your Firebase account.
If you\'d like to automatically verify devices in the future, consider enabling two-factor authentication on your account.
If you decide to enable two-factor authentication, ensure you retain access to one or more account recovery methods.
